resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157075</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Trip to ......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meine Reise zu......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon voyage à......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu desengate a......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il mio viaggio a......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ταξίδι μου ......</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi viaje a......</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners will write a project/research work on the country of their choice. This project has all the guidelines to writing a project. Can be used in lower grades of English speaking learners , and in higher grades for those who speak English as their second language</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">country</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">descriptive writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">summarize</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger schreiben eine project/research Arbeit 
auf das Land ihrer Wahl. Dieses Projekt hat alle Korrekturlinien
zum Schreiben eines Projektes. Kann in den untereren Graden der 
englischsprechenden Anfänger und in den höheren Graden für die 
verwendet werden, die Englisch als ihre zweite Sprache sprechen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants écriront un travail de 
project/research sur le pays de leur choix. Ce projet a toutes 
les directives à écrire un projet. Peut être utilisé dans 
les qualités inférieures des étudiants qui parlent anglais, et dans
des catégories plus élevées pour ceux qui parlent anglais en tant 
que leur deuxième langage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners escreverão um trabalho de 
project/research no país de sua escolha. Este projeto tem todos
os guidelines a escrever um projeto. Pode ser usado em umas 
classes mais baixas de learners falar ingleses, e em umas classes mais
elevadas para aqueles que falam o inglês como sua segunda língua</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti scriveranno un lavoro di 
project/research sul paese della loro scelta. Questo progetto ha
tutta la guida di riferimento a scrivere un progetto. Può 
essere usato nelle qualità più inferiori dei principianti anglofoni 
e negli più alti gradi per coloro che parla inglese come loro secondo
linguaggio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι θα γράψουν μια εργασία 
προγράμματος/έρευνας για τη χώρα της επιλογής τους. Αυτό το
πρόγραμμα έχει όλες τις οδηγίες στο γράψιμο ενός προγράμματος. 
Μπορέστε να χρησιμοποιηθείτε στους χαμηλότερους βαθμούς 
αγγλόφωνων αρχαρίων, και στους υψηλότερους βαθμούς για εκείνους 
που μιλούν τα αγγλικά ως δεύτερη γλώσσα τους</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes escribirán un trabajo de 
project/research en el país de su opción. Este proyecto tiene 
todas las guías de consulta a escribir un proyecto. Se puede 
utilizar en calidades más inferiores de principiantes el discurso 
ingleses, y en grados más altos para los que hablen inglés como su 
segundo lenguaje</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Land</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibendes Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fassen Sie zusammen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenfähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture descriptive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">récapitulez</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita descritiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sumarie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">paese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura descrittiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricapitoli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγραφικό γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συνοψίστε</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες εκμάθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">país</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">escritura descriptiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resuma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

  </description>
